root_cause_analysis.finding: platform-tools v1.52 Windows 版本仍然打包 rustc 1.75.0-dev
root_cause_analysis.evidence: error: package `toml_edit v0.23.9` cannot be built because it requires rustc 1.76 or newer, while the currently active rustc version is 1.75.0-dev
root_cause_analysis.conclusion: Anza 的 Windows platform-tools 发布版本未更新 rustc，v1.42 和 v1.52 均为 1.75.0-dev
